slides: h Improsent Help
b This show contains the improsent command reference
b type 'n' and press enter at any time to move to the next slide in the help.
h Basic Commands: Images
b i: brings up the first medium size image result from Google Images.
b il: brings up the first large image result from Google Images.
b iu: displays the image at the url given.
h Basic Commands: Slides
b h: Creates a new slide with the heading specified and a bulleted list.
b ho: Creates a new slide with the heading specified and an ordered list.
b b: Adds a list item to the slide (bullet). Inline latex can be wrapped in '$$'
h Basic Commands: Misc
b w: Displays the wikipedia summary of the search query.
b eq: Displays a render of the given latex equation.
b bg: Sets the background color to the css color provided, can be hex.
h Basic Commands: Slab Text
b s: Displays the text using the slabText algorithm.
b It wraps text to fit into neat lines and adjusts the font sizes to fit
b The algorithm will automatically split lines but you can specify lines by separating them with ', '
h Basic Commands: Playback and Saving
b play: Loads the specified presentation, user created or provided.
b save: Saves all executed commands to the presentation specified.
b n: Advances to the next slide/command in the loaded presentation.
b clearhist: Clears the history, any saved presentations will start here.
h Look at the source code on Github to learn more about how commands work.
